values: I love hearing concrit! Please let me know here about my driving with Rufus ShinRA [Anomaly] or if you have any questions ♥
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/3007.html

[Your favorite bitch is back! Only not really. By now, Rufus is more than enough pissed to see all the data she had from before lost once more. Oh, yeah, and the fact that she's back in her suite.] I grow tired of this. [a clipped tone, but nothing to indicate she's upset.] It would be preferred if it would at least manifest itself in new ways. I take it that all that "died" are well again?
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/7671.html

[Pacing around where she was calling her living area. Maps: gone with the flood, notes: gone with the crash, she had one thing ... ] Hmm, it seems that I misplaced my ship roster. If you all wouldn't mind, it seems I have to start from scratch. [Is now a good time to reveal herself? Perhaps. Or perhaps not. She can never tell with this ship.] It is quite simple: state your name, age, sex and home world. For instance: my name is Rufus ShinRa, I am twenty-three years old, female and from the planet Gaia. [That pause means you better cooperate.] [ooc; for your convince: ]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/7213.html

[Considering when she last posted, it seems it's gotten worse. She looks like she's been roaming around the ruined ship, even wading through some water to get her clothes dirty. She's panting, as if she ran a large distance in a short amount of time like she was chasing something. For once, emotion graces her features like anger, maybe even a little fear for the unknown. She calls out:] I know you're here, I saw you; if you want revenge, you really shouldn't be such a coward. You can't hide behind your spawn anymore. [Then there it is; a headless figure that seems to be wafting through the mist. Rufus had been hiding a gun from several of the dead crew members. Unlike most, logical people who run away from what they are most afraid of, Rufus intends to mock it.] I do not understand why you're so upset. If both of them were such good sons, they should have known - they should have known I had you. Then again, you were not the most prized parent, hmm? [Something moves, and Rufus shoots sharply ahead her - not knowing what she hit. All those years in military school started to pay off, it seems. She stalks around the a corner in the devastated hull, gun poised and ready. She peeks over the corner, and there's a movement- ] Nothing. I refuse to believe that. [As if she's baiting the mist:] I'm sure Kadaj and Yazoo would love to see you one more time, JENOVA. [Something makes a noise, and she turns sharply as if she wants to elbow someone in the face and shoots out that way too.]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/7073.html

[Finally, she re-emerges. No one knows where Rufus went, perhaps it would be best if no one wondered either. She's tense, as if she's expecting something to happen. She doesn't really fear anything, but there's always that sneaking suspicion of everyone- just amplified] It's a little too quiet, is it not?
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/6783.html
[Standing over the wreckage, looking outside again] How odd that I never appreciated that planet before. [That feeling in the air, is plotting]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/6433.html

[She's taking this rather calmly. Standing wearing nothing but a sheet around his/her waist, digging through all her possessions to find something to wear] Of all things, this is completely - Someone has to have male clothes to wear.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/6387.html

[Ho-hum, under the medium effect of the pollen. She's sitting in her bedroom with curlers in her hair wearing a black and white dress for once.] There seems to be something wrong with the ship. However, there is nothing that points to such a thing.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/6112.html
[She has a firearm. Don't ask how she got it, but she has one. Rufus is going a huntin' because she is bored and killing stuff makes her happy] If something happens, tell me.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/5788.html

[... her wardrobe. What happened to all her pants? The droids are playing dress up and Rufus is currently left is this. And, her center of balance is off.] I am beginning to loathe this ship. Utter- [her sensible shoes, sob there are only heels now] Such an inconvenience.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/5500.html

This is not Junon, nor is this Edge. However, what begs the question is what is this place is and why am I here. I am currently in search of four of my associates, they were accompanying my on official business before I was so politely [a pause on the screen] borrowed. I'll discuss compensation upon completion. [ooc; She remembers nothing. ♥ Have fun?]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/5244.html

[Sitting in the cabin with a lit cigarette and for some odd reason, the box decided that she needed a mini Tseng plushie, he's propped up across from her with her heavy brand] Ridiculous. [... and that's it.]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/5084.html

[President time is go! She's sitting with the Master List of the crew, and has a somewhat complete map of the ship that she made herself.] First and foremost, there needs to be room for the passengers who have their rooms lost need place to be rather than the suites. My map is incomplete, but I see that the bay is accessible now - though, you cannot trust it. If anyone has a more complete map than mine, sharing it would be advisable. As much as you want to assist me, we need to work together to stay alive. The life support failure is getting worse. I trust you're unharmed? You're wanted, I need to know if you'd do your duty as a Turk to me, even if I'm not him. You've been here the longest, yes? You probably ... [inhales deeply] know a considerable amount more than I do about the ship and captain. Would you care to share? Oh, and before she dies? A tribute to Larxene. [Remember this post of Kid!Larxene? Yeah, it's playing. On all spheres. On all monitors. All the time. ♥ Rufus hates you bb.]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/4732.html

[... the sphere turns on to Rufus pulling out a multitude of ribbons from her hair, now back in its natural curly state.] It would be advisable for the captain to give us fair warning next time. Then at least I could say that it never happened. Though, if this is for revenge on us for "killing the crew", for once I should be glad for his naivety on 'eye for an eye'. [Opening her drawer to find a dress - for a cat before smirking] Salem, I seem to have something for you.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/4371.html

[there is a very stern faced little girl playing with her long hair, complete with ribbons and that overly superfluous white dress] Is there anything interesting to do around here? I assume I've been kidnapped, though I'm sure that the people who did it are probably doing it wrong. You know, once Tseng hears about this - you're all going to get it, right? You all can't be that stupid enough to make me think that I'm on a space ship, but now I'm pretty sure who you all work for.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/4145.html

<i>[Asher was kind enough to bring her back to her room, however she still has a big bruise on her neck and she's really pale. As usual, she's covered head to toe in cloth that hides everything, though this time around, her neck is exposed. All that can be seen is that she's fast asleep, her foot kicked the sphere to the floor, and it turned on. Her room looks kind of neat, kind of - books on military history of Xentax Four and the military tactics of the General Farg are on the floor.

... Feel free to wake her up.]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/3984.html

[With the arrival of her original counterpart, Rufus is rather amused. Though, she is suspicious of everyone. Rather than stay closed up in her room, she's decided that why the hell not to explore, she knows where she's going to end up. She's come prepared, though! The sphere shows Rufus carrying a water bottle and her hair is done up high in a pony tail. As usual, she's hidden completely from head to toe. Black turtle neck, white jacket on top of it and white slacks that go way past the ankle and black flats.] Three dead-ends, four changed hallways. [an amused chuckle as she gets another dead end and starts to go back before she hits the shopping complex.] How quaint, shopping; does the captain or whoever is in control think that I would find this amusing? [a huff B|]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/3669.html

[Guess who is playing on the sphere. Rufus has been watching Gwen Stefani videos and she does not like what she sees. She looks very stoic, but her lips are pursed and the video.] Hn, superfluous. [shuts it off. B|]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/3439.html

[The hologram is curled up in her very big bed with a large bottle of water, looking more pale than usual. Neat hair in a high ponytail and wearing loose clothes. In her hand, there is a romance novel, though the title doesn't matter the picture on the front has a very busty female warrior holding onto a frail sort of guy; hot, but why he's dressed as a male concubine? That's what's amusing her. All of this in the aftermath of being a donor to Asher.] I take it that the system of Xenna Five is a female dominating species that uses males for their genetic value and their aesthetic form. It's somewhat refreshing to see a man being chained and shackled and being forced to marry the strong Queen. [Maybe that just revealed what type of President she is, or how much she hates men. Either way, she's in a good mood, and there's an empty spot on her bed.]
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/3158.html

Considering some earlier events - [In which she means that she almost adopted a cat that was a male human] - I think that it would be a precautionary measure against future events that could end unfavorably. [But hey, she got a pet out of it] That means, I would like to get to know the passengers more. We're a wide selection of people, perhaps there's a pattern to the captain's madness? Names, at least, please. [there's an edit, Rufus adds the following] It would be preferred if you answered with: your name, age, race, room number, perhaps planet of origin, expertise and trade/occupation. I am attempting to combine a master list of all the passengers on board.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/2765.html

A prime example of what could be qualified as poor kidnapping etiquette, if I may be permitted to be liberal with my assessment. There is a specific set of guidelines that I believe should be followed - as agreed upon by some commission of sort by a collection of criminals - before abducting ones person. I suppose I should extend my gratitude towards the individuals responsible for leaving my more private person alone.

[adjusting her high collared jacket to hide more of her body; an indication that she did check her underwear first.]

Interesting concept for a containment cell, though sterile, I have little reason to believe otherwise.

[pursing her lips together]

Enough of this small talk, I demand to know who or what is responsible for the abduction of the President of the ShinRa Electrical Company. I will not be held without pretext, nor will I be held even if I have a reason for it.
http://pharshinra.livejournal.com/2475.html

Player Name: Setine
Personal LJ: [info]pushpushlady
E-mail: setinechan@gmail.com
AIM: you be PWMED
Other characters currently in-game: None!

Character Name: Rufus ShinRa
Fandom: Final Fantasy VII
Gender: Female
Age: 25
Sexuality (if applicable): asexual/heterosexual
Original or Anomaly?: Anomaly (as indicated by the sex) 

<lj-cut text="rest under here">

Personality: Being born with the stigma of having a boys name, Rufus acts extremely masculine despite her frame. To compensate and in order to compete, Rufus learned to act like a man, walk like a man, talk like a man. Rufus doesn't dress sexily on purpose in order to be taking seriously during a meeting. She demands their attention wholeheartedly on her words and her ideas rather her cleavage. She talks in a very low voice hardly melodic often bare of any emotion, barely raising it when she's angry and even then it's hardly feminine. Her words are often cutting, and to her workers, she's brutally honest. She demands things a certain way, if it done in her way, her algorithm often there's hell to pay.

Mostly, she's like her original counterpart with the exception that she's even more deceptive because she has that added bonus of being able to use the fact that she's a very good looking woman to her advantage. She's cunning, if not a little on the quiet side, but she isn't one to be trusted. She could be smiling at you one day and another day, she could be putting a gun to your head.

The thing that she hates the most, running a company such as ShinRa that when she's discriminated as being weak, or soft just because she's a woman. If someone does that, she will prove them wrong - to this extent she's even colder than her male counterpart. She's mean, horribly mean. She doesn't want to be associated with women, nor does she want people to assume that she's too masculine. She's worked very hard to maintain a balance between the two sexes and she's managed to make a spot for herself within the top office of ShinRa as President and still have the respect and loyalty of her workers.

History: Much to his fathers chagrin, Rufus was born female. Angry that his father had only to give the company to the first male heir - and that being Rufus' half brother Lazard, Rufus was instantly had to work uphill. The name had already been chosen, and all her baby items were engraved with the name RS - to follow in her father's footprints - and President ShinRa was not going to change it then. Thus, Rufus was cursed with a male name.

Chastised with it in private school, "Ew, Rufus is a boys name" and "Hahaha, you're so ugly that in order to fool people your parents gave you a boys name to try and hide the fact that you're a girl!", Rufus compensated for being the top in everything. She was the top student, a talented pianist, military genius and business mastermind. It was roughly at the age of thirteen that against all odds, Rufus enrolled in the Junon Navy Academy to learn more about the military so that she would take over the family business. When she was twelve, her parents had a bitter divorce which led to her mother being bankrupt and being forced to move to the slums of Midgar.

For a while, Rufus hid her sex by binding the chest (which wasn't very full and quite flat) and rarely speaking unless she was spoken to. She showered late at night when no one was around, and not even going to the bathroom unless there was no one there. For the longest time, everyone thought that she was homosexual just by the way she acted and was tortured endlessly about it. In reality, Rufus never cared for relationships after watching her father and mother. Her father would cheat and in retaliation so would her mother. When she first got her period, the males in the dorm thought that she was diseased and she was taken to the male school nurse and he was the first person to realize that she was actually a he. Time went on and by sixteen, Rufus had finally started to grow into her body, all the while she lied to her father that she was in finishing school.

Rufus' sex was revealed when a group of boys decided to play a prank of the silent child and decided to strip them and haze her (him). Thankfully, Rufus got wind of this and wrote to her only father figure, a Turk that had been her nanny at the time, Tseng and asked him what to do. In the middle of the night, Rufus was taken and stripped. When they realized it was a very pretty girl, and tried to advance on her - Rufus killed her first person.

The death had been hidden by Rufus' family, but it was then that Rufus' father, intrigued that Rufus had opted to go to military school, sent him home. As a snub to Lazard, Rufus' father anointed him the Vice Presidency of ShinRa. Rufus found out about this, and was furious. She hadn't earned her title, it was just given just because ShinRa wanted to look progressive rather than backwards. Rufus held no actual power.

As time grew, Rufus began to hate her father more and more. She was a scapegoat, belittled by his higher ups and not taken seriously by the company. She craved to be recognized for her efforts - so she started to work against her father in order to gain control of the company. Caught, she was sentenced to treason, but she had forged the company into two creating factions so she peacefully agreed to be in the care of her first care takers, the Turks. Tseng taught her everything, Reno taught her how to act like a man, Rude refined and Tseng molded her into the woman that she is today. 

Strengths: Rufus is very good around weaponry; she's an excellent marksman and she can create and wire explosives. Also, she's a great leader that inspires loyalty within her employees and the people that serve her. She also manages to wind people around her finger.

Weaknesses: Her personality is not the best of them, she's cruel and unyielding. Her pride sets her back, as well as her arrogance. She's also afraid of touch, thinking that she may get hurt - to this extent, she's frail. Also, if she's belittled as a woman, she will lose her temper. 

</lj-cut>
